posts.post_content:
The following four cards are for sale to help pay for my Business Masters:

Addie Joss (Pitching) - Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 30 - $180
Hugh Duffy - Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 - £180
Jimmy Collins - Piedmont 350 Factory 25 - $145
Joe Tinker (Bat off shoulder) - Sovereign 350 - $210

Prices include postage.
Please send PM or email to [url]marpar73@hotmail.com[/url]

Larger images can be seen at [url]http://martinsbaseballcards.com/[/url]
